description:
A quality Duracell battery to power your favourite small devices.

  • Also known as: CR2025, DL2025, ECR2025, NA, BR2025, 208-205, DL20256B, BR2025-1W, CR2025-1W, KCR2025
  • Guaranteed for 10 years in storage with Duracell’s Duralock Power Preserve™ Technology
  • Common application: Heartrate monitors, car alarm fobs, watches, bike computers, and cameras
name: Duracell 2025 3V Lithium Single
